title: Interpretation of dreams of stealing my house, dream of stealing a house in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that my house was robbed, for a single girl, for a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married and single, whether they stole money, car furniture, money, gold, and more. Ibn Sirin Interpretation of stealing a house in a dream Whoever dreams that someone is stealing his house and there is a family member who is tired or sick, this symbolizes that this sick person will recover from his illness. And whoever sees in a dream that he killed the thief or killed him, this means that the owner of the dream will survive the illness. Whoever has an unmarried girl in his house and sees in his dream that a thief is stealing his house, this indicates that this girl will get married. If you dream that someone you know is stealing from you, this symbolizes that this thief will benefit from the stolen person with some knowledge and useful things. Theft generally refers to adultery and usury, and whoever dreams that someone he does not know has stolen from him, it means that a family member will die. And whoever sees in his dream that an old man of unknown age has stolen from him, this means that someone is lying to a friend of yours. And whoever sees in his dream that he is stealing, this means that the owner of the dream is spying on one of his friends or relatives. Seeing a thief in a dream This dream indicates an encounter with some problems and sometimes shows kindness and a guest who will come to you. A thief enters your house in a dream This vision indicates that you are facing internal problems and will appear in Your life has some problems that you do not know the reason for and that will appear suddenly. If a thief enters your house and steals your things, this indicates the illness of one of your family members and his recovery from this illness after that. According to another interpretation, the thief's escape before you steal his things indicates the precautions that you will take before falling into hardship. Seeing thieves or robbers attacking you and stealing a large part of the things you have indicates a friend who will get into trouble and that you will feel sorry for him. The thief entering the house indicates the marriage of a girl from the house, but if you see your house empty, this indicates that you have achieved some of your goals after its meaning, but if you see yourself as a thief in a dream, this indicates a bad path for your work. As for chasing the thief and arresting him in a dream, this indicates the defeat of his enemies. If you see things stolen from someone you do not know, this indicates that you listened to the words of an elderly person. If you see a thief stealing your things and witnessing it, this indicates the money that you will get without lawful Theft This dream indicates that your work is going well. Between you and your family and friends, and if the one who sees this vision is a student, this indicates the success that he will achieve in the coming days. If you see that you have caught a thief and handed him over to the police, this means that you have noticed a mistake in what you did and you will feel remorse for it, and there is another interpretation of this vision, which is the victor over your enemies. And reaching a higher level than them. If you see that you have caught a thief and killed him in a dream, this indicates the illness that afflicts you and you get rid of it after a while, and if you are sick and have this vision, you will recover. Reciting the call to prayer by the thief This vision shows your success, which people around you will talk about Chasing a thief This vision shows that its owner is trying hard to solve a problem

title: Interpretation of hair loss in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we provide you in detail with the interpretation of hair loss in a dream. Seeing hair loss is really annoying especially for women because it represents an adornment for them and increases their beauty. In addition, this problem is one of the most common problems for them. As for the world of dreams, it is one of the visions that indicate that something bad has happened to the dreamer, and although it is an annoying vision, it arouses curiosity from the dreamers, whether they are men. Great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin presented Ibn Shaheen has several interpretations of this dream that you can see through his encyclopedia. Interpretation of hair loss in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpreter of dreams, Ibn Sirin, mentioned that if the dreamer sees his hair falling out and being torn in a dream, then this vision is good news for him that the worries and problems that he suffers from in life will go away. If the hair is black in a dream and the dreamer sees that many of its strands are falling out, then this vision indicates goodness and abundance of livelihood represented by gaining a lot of money. Seeing a lot of hair falling out, this vision indicates fulfilling a promise and paying off debts if the dreamer has a debt in Reality. If the dreamer sees that his hair has completely fallen out, then this vision symbolizes that the dreamer is going through a difficult period in his life full of crises. If the hair falls out as a result of being plucked in a dream, then this vision expresses the financial crises that the dreamer is going through in reality. Interpretation of a dream Hair loss by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen pointed out that if the dreamer sees that his hair is falling out a lot in a dream, then this vision expresses that he is not taking advantage of opportunities well. If this dream was during the Hajj period, this indicates a visit to the Sacred House of God in the near future, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that his hair has completely fallen out, then this vision indicates the problem that the dreamer is suffering from as a result of the great responsibilities that fall on his shoulders. Black hair falling out in a dream indicates deception and deception to which the dreamer is exposed to those around him. In the case of chin hair falling out, this vision It indicates repentance and commitment to obedience to God. If the hair falls out and becomes curly in a dream, then this vision means paying off the debt for the dreamer who is burdened with debt, but if the hair is soft, then this indicates the loss of money. Interpretation of hair loss in a dream for a single woman. Hair loss in a dream for an unmarried girl is one of the visions. A good dream that indicates goodness and nourishment, especially if she sees her hair falling out a lot. This vision also symbolizes the achievement of the goals that she seeks in reality, and it is good news that she will get married soon, and God knows best. As for hair loss as a result of cutting in the dream, this vision expresses Positive changes that the dreamer is going through in reality. Yellow hair loss in a dream is a dream that indicates the changes that the dreamer is going through, and it is also good news for her to recover from the illness if she is really sick. Hair loss in a dream for a married woman This vision for a married woman also symbolizes The coming of relief and the end of the problems and worries experienced in H

title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking mango juice: seeing peeling and cutting a mango in a dream

preview.html: Seeing mango juice in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, eating mango for a girl, picking a mango from the tree, preparing green or yellow mango juice, according to Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq and. Drink mango juice in a dream. One of the most beautiful dreams that causes us a state of calm and great joy, as many people love to eat whole mangoes or juice, because of its wonderful properties and many health benefits that greatly benefit the body, and it is one of the fruits. Which only appears to us in the summer, and we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing drinking mango juice in a dream, as interpreted by the translator Ibn Sirin in his interpretations. Interpretation of mango juice in a dreamImam Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing a mango or mango in a dream and a dream in general means happiness, sustenance, comfort, joy, and everything that a person desires. And he waits for him. Real life, memorization and facilitation of the topics it presents in its reality. As for the one who sees in his dream that he drinks mango juice in a dream and its taste is pleasant, this vision shows the nutrition that the viewer gets in his reality. Whoever sees in his dream that he wants to prepare mango juice from inedible and damaged mangoes, then his vision indicates misfortunes and repulsive things that the dreamer does not wish to achieve in his real life, such as suffering from illness or anxiety and stress. Whoever sees in his dream that he is peeling or cutting a fruit Mango, seeing it shows many things, and the dream indicates the dreamer’s happiness in his life and the comfort that he will find, God willing. It also indicates nourishment, kindness and the good praise that people praise him and hear when he wakes up, and his good social relationships with family, loved ones, neighbors and all people. Interpretation of drinking Mango juice in a dreamDrinking mango juice in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will obtain money and achieve many great successes in life, in addition to a lot of money and great successes. Seeing a married woman who bought mangoes in a dream. She cut them and prepared juices from them and they were very delicious. This is evidence that she will soon have a lot of money and will make a wonderful discovery in her life. Buying mangoes in a dream indicates that the dreamer will receive kindness and abundant nutrition in the coming period. Also, seeing mangoes in a dream for a person Stumbling indicates a great discovery and that he will receive an abundance of sustenance and kindness in the coming days. A married woman who prepares a delicious juice in a dream is evidence that she will be able to raise her children with a wonderful upbringing and will also have a loyal husband. Interpretation of drinking mango juice in a dream for a single woman: Seeing Ready mango juice in a dream, for unmarried women, is evidence that they will obtain comfort and goodness in the near future, as well as that they will obtain goodness, happiness, and getting rid of all their problems. An unmarried woman drank mango in a dream and there were insects or worms in the dream, evidence of She will undergo some trials in life and will become closer to God Almighty because of these experiences. Drinking A juice

title: What is the interpretation of an earthquake in a dream? A dream about an earthquake occurring in the house

preview.html: Contents: Seeing the earthquake for a single girl, married, pregnant woman, divorced, married or unmarried, whether the earthquake in the orchard, the house, the street, the house, the fall of our house and the earthquake and more about Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shirin. Interpretation of the earthquake in a dream An earthquake in a dream indicates the fear of the Sultan And if the dreamer sees a land shaking and subdued, and there are a group of people in it, then this indicates the sultan descending upon it and torturing its people. An earthquake indicates a serious illness, and it is also said: If the fortuneteller sees that the earth is shaking, this indicates that the city is exposed to drought, cold, and excessive fear. If the dreamer sees an earthquake In the house and saw that the walls had fallen, this indicates death, and this indicates the abundance of fruits and plants. Seeing an earthquake in a dream is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel distressed. The interpretation of the dream varies depending on where the earthquake occurred in the dream. It could be in a public place or in a place. The dreamer. Residence. Seeing an earthquake in a dream generally indicates the dreamer’s fear of the Lord or the owner of the place. But if one sees that a famous mountain in a certain place was shaken from its position and was struck by a strong earthquake, this means that the ruler of that place will suffer many misfortunes. If one dreams of seeing an earthquake in a dream, then an earthquake occurs in a certain place, and it causes the annihilation of some people and some survive. The other, it means that that place will be affected by disease, destroying some and saving others, or that the king of this land is an unjust person who spreads injustice in the city and tortures its people. If one dreams that a certain city whose land was struck by an earthquake and the sky was also turbulent and moving, this means that the people of that city The city will be punished by God for their money and they will get sick, but if the dreamer sees that the earth is moving, this means that the dreamer’s personal matters will fall upon it... movement and change. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that the earth is shaking, this means that the pregnant woman will soon give birth and meet her child, or that she will face Some difficulties in her pregnancy, or she will contract a disease that will cause her some problems. Disturbances during pregnancy. If a man dreams that the earth was struck by a strong earthquake that led to the collapse of houses and the destruction of property, then this dream indicates misfortunes and misfortunes and may indicate the death of a person or the injury of a person. Illness. If one dreams that he sees the earth shaking, this means that disasters and misfortunes will happen to the people of that country, or that the dreamer is hiding some secrets from people, and things will happen that make people learn these secrets, or that they will hear some bad news that will make him afraid. If one dreams To see a desolate land that has no crops and is trembling, this means that this land will change its condition and crops will grow on it. An earthquake in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will face severe problems with his life partner. If one dreams of seeing an earthquake in a dream and the dreamer dreams in July, this is a sign of the death of a famous person. If one dreams that the ground is shaking violently and the dream is in the month of June, this means That the dreamer's enemies and people who hate him will be destroyed and defeated. But if the dreamer sees an earthquake in a dream in the month of May, then this dream...

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a nightgown in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I buy a nightgown in a dream. We will learn about the interpretation of the dream that I buy a nightgown in a dream, all of this and more details that interest you, as reported by interpretation scholars.Interpretation of a dream that I buy a nightgown in a dreamInterpretation of the dream that I buy a nightgown in a dream can represent Marriage, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl is seen buying a nightgown, this may lead to marriage, God willing. When you see a married woman buying a nightgown, this may indicate constancy, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself buying a white nightgown, it may represent an emotional relationship, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream I bought Refrigerator in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I bought a refrigerator in a dream could indicate good changes, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl dreams of buying a refrigerator, it may be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen buying a refrigerator, this may lead to prosperity, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself buying A refrigerator in a dream, this may be a sign of good changes and he has all the knowledge. Interpretation of a dream that I bought a Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I bought a Qur’an in a dream, it could be a sign of goodness and blessing, and God knows best. When you see yourself buying a copy of the Qur’an in a dream, this may represent a good situation, with permission. GodIf a married man sees himself buying a copy of the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate paying off the debt of his own free will. If a young man is seen buying a copy of the Qur’an, it may lead to livelihood, God willing. Interpretation of a dream that I buy a prayer rug in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I buy a prayer rug in a dream can lead to To the money he gets, and God is Most High, Most Knowing. When you see buying a prayer rug in a dream, this indicates goodness and livelihood, and God is Most High, Most Knowing. If a girl sees herself buying a prayer rug in a dream, it can be a sign of happiness, God willing. If a married woman sees herself buying a prayer rug in a dream, It may be a sign of profit, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. I dreamed that I was selling watermelon in a dream. I dreamed that I was selling watermelon in a dream. It may be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man dreams that he is selling watermelons in the market, this may indicate his marriage, and God knows the unseen. If a married man is seen selling watermelon. This may be good news, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself in a dream selling watermelon, this may be a sign of good news, and God knows best. I dreamed that I bought a camel in a dream. I dreamed that I bought a camel in a dream, which may be a sign of marriage, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself buying a camel in a dream, it may be good news, and God knows best. This is evidence that he has land or a house, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees himself buying a camel in a dream, it may represent marriage, and God is All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees herself buying a camel in a dream, this may indicate marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of eating pulp in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing eating pulp in a dream for one girl: An unmarried girl who dreams of seeing herself eating pulp and its taste was wonderful in the dream. That is, the dreamer will hear good news that will make her jump for joy, and God knows best. Seeing pulp and eating it in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of kindness and adequate nutrition for her. As for the girl who dreams that she cannot buy pulp in a dream, it is an unfavorable sign that a bad event will happen to her soon, and God knows best. And if an unmarried girl sees that she cannot eat pulp in a dream, this dream means that she cannot solve her problems, and God knows best. And it may It indicates his inability to bear responsibility and endure distress, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is buying pulp and eating it. A good vision will help her get rid of the problems and fears that she suffers from. Seeing pulp of the sunflower type in an unmarried girl’s dream. A metaphor for marriage. Soon, God willing. Seeing brown pulp in a dream for a single girl. It indicates the loss of a person dear to her heart through death, and God knows best. As for the appearance of yellow pulp in a dream for a single girl, this means that he will be exposed to a serious illness, and God knows best. What if the girl sees something wrong? A married woman has white pulp and suffered from a disease. It is good skin that heals, and God knows best. Seeing the comfort of eating pulp in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her success in study or success, and promotion at work, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing pulp in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation Watching the consumption of pulp in a dream for a married woman. A married woman saw her husband eating porridge in a dream and it tasted wonderful. A good dream symbolizes a major promotion for her husband and makes their lives better, and God knows best. A married woman with children dreams that she is carrying a plate of porridge and she was happy with it in the dream. This dream indicates On the success of her children in school, and God knows best. Seeing pulp in a dream for a married woman in a dream. It is a sign of goodness and nourishment, and God knows best. As for eating white pulp in a dream for a married woman, it is a good vision that shows paying off debts and hearing good news. It also indicates the stability of the marital relationship. For the viewer. Shedding light on getting rid of problems and obstacles, and God knows best. But when you see dry yellow pulp in a married woman’s dream. It symbolizes the accumulation of debts on her husband, and God knows best. Perhaps it indicates her illness or the illness of a member of her family, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of eating pulp. In a dream about a man and its meaning. When a man dreams that he is going to buy pulp from an eyeball, but he cannot buy it due to lack of money in the dream. An indication of the difficulties he faces and reveals himself in his personal and professional life, and God knows best. As for a man who dreams that he sells pulp in a dream, it is a good omen. For abundant livelihood. And for a man who sees his wife eating pulp in a dream. This dream shows her love for him and his happiness with her, and God knows best. And for seeing a small dough in a dream. Good skin in the appearance of pregnancy in the fortuneteller’s wife, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing her eating porridge in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman buying Pulp F

title: What is the interpretation of seeing full rain in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you an interpretation of the dream of heavy rain. It always rains in winter and in cold places, but the heavy rain in our lives is the soul and one of the great blessings that God has given us. In a complete dream, the dream of many people of seeing heavy rain came, so we present to you, my beloved God, everything related to the interpretation of seeing heavy rain at night, as well as what is the interpretation of seeing heavy rain in the shrine, as well as what is the interpretation of seeing heavy rain, lightning, thunder, and so on. It symbolizes the interpretation of seeing rain in the summer. Seeing visions What is the interpretation of seeing heavy rain for women and men. Why does Imam Al-Sadiq dream of heavy rain? The interpretation of seeing in a dream with heavy rain, according to Imam Al-Sadiq, indicates the beginning of favorable changes in the dreamer’s life. Heavy rain in a complete dream is one of the visions that indicates On the return of the traveler, Morocco, reconciliation between people, and the return of rights. The interpretation of seeing heavy rain in a dream indicates great relief for the dreamer from God, and his next life will be calm and stable. But feeling very cold when you see heavy rain in a dream is a sign of deception and betrayal by a loved one. Heavy rain in a dream is full of desirable dreams that the poor and needy should see, because it indicates wealth and goodness. Heavy rain in a dream indicates the abundance of money for the dreamer, great rewards, and many benefits, and it also indicates good circumstances. Why do you dream of heavy rain falling at night? Why dream of heavy rain at night for an ordinary woman who brought her to tell her of happy days full of joy and pleasure? Seeing full heavy rain in a dream, and a single woman looking at it from the door of her house or balcony, is evidence that the groom has arrived to her. Seeing full rain in a dream also indicates for a woman that she You will achieve many goals and achieve what you want. The interpretation of seeing heavy rain falling at night for someone in trouble is one of the good dreams that means comfort and escape from disaster. Seeing rain falling at night and shivering from the cold in the dreamer means that he had to go through some problems and difficulties in his life. Why do you dream of being soaked in the rain in the summer? Heavy rain in the summer in a complete dream is one of the visions that indicate epidemics, wars and diseases. Seeing heavy rain in the summer leading to heavy rain means destruction and ruin. Heavy rain fell from the sky and the sun shone completely in the dream, A sign of escaping from fears in the near future. Why dream of heavy rain, lightning, and thunder? To dream of heavy rain accompanied by lightning and thunder is an unpleasant vision, it means problems and difficulties. Also, seeing this dream indicates that the dreamer will fall into many sins and corrupt actions that will lead him To the road of death. Seeing rain falling with thunder and lightning and suddenly changing for the better, the weather indicates that the dreamer will return to the wrong path and take the right path. Why dream of heavy rain on a university campus? Completeness of seeing heavy rain in a dream and the dreamer calling on his Lord

title: Interpretation of a pot in a dream Meaning of a pot in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a pottery vase for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a pottery jar, a vase of gold and silver, and zeer water by Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of a dream about a vase by Ibn Sirin. The vase generally symbolizes the alleged worker in trade or the person pretending to be in life. Whoever sees in a dream that he is drinking from a jug, this is a sign On pure material gains and a calm and peaceful life. If the dreamer sees that he drinks half of the liquid in the jar, this symbolizes the passing of the years of his life, and therefore he has exhausted half of his years. As for the one who sees in a dream that he is drinking all the fluids inside him, this is a sign of the many years he spent working, toiling and toiling. If the dreamer sees that he is carrying a jar of water in his palm, but it falls from his hand and breaks, then this indicates the death of the family and the birth of a pregnant woman. Who dreams At night, if he has a jar full of oil or honey, this indicates a storeroom, a bank account, or security at home. Anyone who sees a bottle in a dream should know that the bottle symbolizes a boy, and it is also possible that the bottle indicates a woman who does not keep secrets. A dream about a bottle, in case he sees it The dreamer in a dream, it could indicate an illness or an adulterous woman, especially if there is urine in the bottle. It is possible that the bottle in the dream refers to men of different races and sometimes the bottles indicate gossip and also indicate divulging secrets and people who are not honest with them. If the bottle is broken in the dream, then turmoil will leave the dreamer’s house. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is carrying a jar filled with water with one of the ropes, and then the rope breaks, this indicates a violation of the agreement between him and his companions in the professional field or his divorce in society. Life. A jar can indicate a woman, a man, a healthy life, or a state of mind. Seeing empty jars often indicates poverty and sadness for the dreamer. Full jars indicate success. Seeing broken vases indicates disappointment and illness. Buying jars indicates that success It will be difficult and your burdens are heavy. Drinking from a vessel in a dream indicates a peaceful and stable life, and drinking from a vessel is similar to drinking from any vessel. As for seeing the jar filled with oil, honey, or any stored food in the shape of a tiger, it indicates the fortuneteller’s source of livelihood or stock. Whether it is financial or livelihood, it may be a bank account or a storehouse at home. As for the jar tied to the solution, it is a treaty and covenant between the dreamer and a partner or companion, and ending the rope is breaking the bond. The jar in a dream is an agent worker, and money flows from his hand and they trust him. Drinking water from the jar is lawful money. And a decent life. Whoever sees that he drank half of his water, half his life is over. If he drank less than that or more, then his interpretation is that he will remain or his life will be prolonged. . If he sees that he has drunk everything in the jar, then his whole life is over, and the same applies to all other vessels. Whoever dreams that he has a jar of water in his palm, then it falls and breaks, and the water remains. His wife is pregnant and dies, but the child remains. It was said: The jar is a woman, or a slave girl, or a slave girl. If the jar is filled with...

title: The death of a father in a dream is a good omen

preview.html: Through this article from gptafser.com/, we review for you, dear reader, the interpretation of the vision in the case of unmarried women, men, pregnant women, married and unmarried women, and divorcees, in order to know the signs of the vision that deserve praise and respect. Rejected. Interpretation of seeing the death of a father in a dream for an unmarried girl. The death of a father makes an unmarried woman feel sad, but this vision in a dream means for her a lot of sustenance and blessings and the disappearance of worries and problems, God willing. It also heralds that she has married a good person who fears God, if he is related to him. , as evidence of her imminent marriage. The death of the father and he was truly alive in the dream of an unmarried girl. It means that God granted him health, wellness, and a long life, God willing. The death of the father in one dream was truly alive. It means that her father is close to God and performs the Sunnah of the Prophet regularly. The vision indicates that this girl loves her father very much and is afraid of losing him in reality. For an unmarried girl to see in her dream that her father has died, this means that the father will provide for him. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a loved one while he is alive. Interpretation of the death of a father in A dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman indicates that her father has died and was actually alive, meaning that he is one of the righteous and obedient to God Almighty. Seeing her in a dream crying for her dead father while he is alive is evidence that she is very attached to him and that she fears for his health. A woman’s crying For a married woman, her father who died in her dream is a good omen. There is a lot of food and goodness that the father will get next time, God willing. The death of a father is a good omen in a dream for a married woman, indicating the birth of a new child. And that this child will have a special future with his parents. Interpret Scholars generally describe death in a married woman’s dream as good and happiness, God willing. A married woman seeing in her dream that her father died while she was alive. If they work is evidence of prestige and high prestige. If she is studying, the vision indicates her success in studying. Seeing her in The dream is that her father died, and she was in a dispute with him in reality. It means the father’s desire to get close to his daughter to end the dispute between them. Or she wants to gain her father’s approval and ask him to allow that, God willing. The interpretation of seeing the father’s death in a dream about the man and its meaning. If you see a man in In his dream, it means that his father died while he was alive. Because there was enmity or disagreement over something with his father in reality, and God knows best. Or that the father knows his son’s secrets that he hides from people. A man seeing in his dream that his father died and his father at that time intends to travel to Outside. It means that the father is exposed to a health problem and extreme exhaustion leads him to death, and God knows best. If the father dies in reality, the man saw him die in his dream before traveling. A sign of the father’s satisfaction with his son, because he was truly fair to him. The death of the father in a dream is news. He walked in a man’s dream, because it is a blessing he enjoys with his family. And if the man quarrels with his father in his dream, the father dies because of that. An unfavorable vision, as it indicates the father’s dissatisfaction with his son in
